attributes.action: Give kids who cant go to school a pc or macbook for online work
attributes.additional_details: Bc not alot of famlys can buy them and then there kids are missing out on work
attributes.background: To give out pc or macbooks to kids who cant go to school

rejection.details:
Currently schools in England are open to all students, but you may wish to sign some of these petitions:

Expand the free laptop scheme for children to one per family so all benefit: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/334273

Provide £500 cash grant to fund children being home schooled: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/313284
